name: Hawlucha
flavorText: Although its body is small, its proficient fighting skills enable it to keep up with big bruisers like Machamp and Hariyama.

abilities.name: Shining Spirit
abilities.text: Damage from this Pokémon's attacks isn't affected by Weakness or Resistance.

attacks.name: Flying Press
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon isn't a Pokémon-EX, this attack does nothing.
